content: the astoria pier hat is a classic fisherman beanie it is very quick to work up and is perfect for background knitting ie knitting while watching a movie in class on a car journey etc literally every row is the same until you get to the crown as written the pattern will make a hat that just pulls over your ears when folded down and just sits above your ears when folded up if you add an additional 20 row it will sit over your ears when folded up the pattern uses center double decreases cdd to create the crown this is a perfect pattern to learn this new skill if you haven t tried it yet there are many tutorials on youtube just search cdd knitting and watch a few to complete this hat you ll need about 150y of your favorite worsted weight yarn
